Package si.ijs.kt.clus.algo.rules

Class ClusRuleLinearTerm

java.lang.Object
si.ijs.kt.clus.algo.rules.ClusRule
si.ijs.kt.clus.algo.rules.ClusRuleLinearTerm
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ClusModel
public class ClusRuleLinearTerm extends ClusRule
A linear term that has been included in the rule set. The weights of these linear terms can also be optimized with GD algorithm.
Author:
Timo Aho
See Also:
